entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
